00035 class IOInfo
00036 {
00037   public:
00038     IOInfo();
00039     virtual ~IOInfo();
00040 
00041     bool equals(IOInfo* );   // instead of ==-operator
00042     virtual bool matches(IOInfo* );
00044     virtual QString convertToString()=0;
00046     virtual QString convertToBinStr()=0;
00048     virtual QString convertToHexStr()=0;
00057     virtual bool convertToASCII(char* ascii, int maxlen, int& length, 
00058         bool singlechar=FALSE) const =0;
00060     virtual IOInfoBin convertToBin(int numbits) const =0;
00062     virtual int convertToInt()=0;
00064     virtual void convertToBinList(IOInfoList& list)=0;
00065 
00067     virtual IOInfo* clone()=0;
00068 
00070     virtual void setBin(QString bin, int numbits)=0;
00077     virtual void setASCII(const char* ascii, int asciilen, int numbits)=0;
00079     virtual void setString(QString string, int numbits)=0;
00080 
00082     virtual int getLength() const=0;
00084     virtual bool isSingle()=0;
00086     virtual QList<IOInfo> getSingles()=0;
00088     virtual void setSize(int) {};
00089 //    virtual void setOutputsSize(int) {};
00090 
00092     virtual void split(IOInfoList& )=0;
